Class DeviceImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Device, Storable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BeaconImpl, CameraImpl, DetectorImpl, DMSImpl, GateArmArrayImpl, GateArmImpl, GpsImpl, LaneMarkingImpl, LCSArrayImpl, RampMeterImpl, TagReaderImpl, VideoMonitorImpl, WeatherSensorImpl
public abstract class DeviceImpl extends ControllerIoImpl implements Device
DeviceImpl is the base class for all field devices, including detectors, cameras, ramp meters, dynamic message signs, etc.
Author:
Douglas Lau
